name: Frontline Sniper Cold War
description:
Frontline Sniper Cold War is first Next Generation Operation Challenge game.

Enjoy the Premium cool sniper and assault bullet effect. City Sniper call of duty want you to attack on enemies
that are trying to overtake the city. They called a Frontline Sniper war. As Sniper Shooter you mission is the clear

the city from enemies from brutal enemies. Aim Perfect to shoot enemies.

you are the skilled sniper battle assassin, you have been assigned for the task to clear the city from brutal enemies.
Select you gun pack with latest weapon technology. Believe in your deadly sniper warrior fury nature and sniper gun
which has amazing clear zoom with 80% of accuracy to take down your target.

Game environment will let you feel the reality of real time war ahead on you. In a battle field sniper rifle and
assault gun won't let you settle down, So keep your sniper attack strategy on the line. Kill all enemies, take control
of occupied operational base.

Game Features:

Full action FPS shooting game.
Best 3D environment, enemy characters and animations.
Best modern sniper gun with zoom for accuracy.
Quality graphics and thrilling sounds.
Modern war weapons.
Amazing Fire effects
Challenging and unique levels
Addictive And optimized game play
Latest weapons.
Cool animations.
No connectivity required while playing.
Tune your armor and stand tough against enemies
